original_text: The angel of God had been leading the army of the Israelites. Now he moved and he went behind them. The pillar of cloud moved and it stood behind the army.
korean_text: 이스라엘 진 앞에 가던 하나님의 사자가 그들의 뒤로 옮겨 가매 구름 기둥도 앞에서 그 뒤로 옮겨

sentences.original_text: The angel of God had been leading the army of the Israelites.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 사자가 이스라엘 군대를 인도하고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Now he moved and he went behind them.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그가 움직여 그들 뒤로 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: and it stood behind the army.
